data.question: Which architectural design philosophy typically prioritizes simple, single-cycle instructions and relies on optimizing compiler technology for performance?
In virtual memory systems, the process of dividing the logical address space into fixed-size blocks that are mapped to physical memory frames is specifically referred to as what?
Which I/O communication technique allows peripheral devices to transfer data directly to or from main memory without the continuous involvement of the Central Processing Unit (CPU)?
In a computer system utilizing micro-programmed control, the sequence of micro-instructions necessary to execute a machine instruction is stored within which specialized component?
What is the primary technical advantage achieved by using floating-point data representation over fixed-point representation in computer arithmetic?
options: Increased execution speed for integer addition
The ability to represent a significantly wider range of magnitudes
Simplified hardware design for the Arithmetic Logic Unit (ALU)
Guaranteed error detection for all overflow conditions
data.answer: The ability to represent a significantly wider range of magnitudes
